          <title>
            <string language="en">Infrared radiation and light rays</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infrarotstrahlung und helle Strahlen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayonnement infrarouge et rayons légers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Radiação infravermelha e raios claros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radiazione infrarossa e raggi luminosi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπέρυθρη ακτινοβολία και ελαφριές ακτίνες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radiación infrarroja y rayos ligeros</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the different stages of a heater that transfers energy by sending out infrared radiation and light rays.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heater</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot objects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infrared radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die unterschiedlichen 
Stadien einer Heizung, die Energie überträgt, indem es 
Infrarotstrahlung und helle Strahlen aussendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les différentes 
étapes d'un réchauffeur qui transfère l'énergie en envoyant le 
rayonnement infrarouge et les rayons légers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os estágios diferentes 
de um calefator que transfira a energia emitindo para fora da 
radiação infravermelha e dos raios claros.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le fasi differenti di
un riscaldatore che trasferisce l'energia spedendo la radiazione 
infrarossa ed i raggi luminosi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει διαφορετικά στάδια μιας 
θερμάστρας που μεταφέρει την ενέργεια με την αποστολή της 
υπέρυθρης ακτινοβολίας και των ελαφριών ακτίνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las diversas etapas de 
un calentador que transfiera energía enviando la radiación 
infrarroja y rayos ligeros.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
